nodes.html: The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) urges all consumers using ATVs to understand the risks and necessary safety measures of ATVs before riding them.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: The dangers of riding OHVs are real and include overturning, collisions and occupant ejection. CPSC’s latest data show an annual average of more than 700 deaths and an estimated 100,000 emergency department-treated injuries involving OHVs.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: CPSC estimates that 112,300 injuries, associated with OHVs, were treated in U.S. hospital emergency departments in 2020. Over five years, ATVs were the vehicle involved in 96 percent of the OHV injuries.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: These 10 states accounted for 931 deaths, or more than 42 percent of the off-highway vehicle deaths from 2016 through 2018: Texas; West Virginia; Pennsylvania; Kentucky; California; Florida; North Carolina; New York; Alabama and Michigan.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Get hands-on training from a qualified instructor, e.g., in an ATV Safety Institute (ASI) course.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: Get hands-on training from a qualified instructor, e.g., in an ATV Safety Institute (ASI) course.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Never ride with more passengers than there are seats. Most ATVs are designed for one rider.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Never ride on public roads, except to cross, where permitted by law.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Avoid drinking alcohol before or while driving an ATV, because alcohol can impair judgment and response time.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Riders younger than 16 should drive only age-appropriate youth models, and never adult models.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Always wear a helmet and other protective gear, such as eye protection, boots, gloves, long pants and a long-sleeved shirt.
